text: Lincoln Heights Jail was a jail building in Lincoln Heights. It closed in 1954. It is said to be haunted. The jail is sometimes used as a movie set. It was used to make parts of the music video for "Telephone" by Lady Gaga. ==References== ==Related pages== *Alcatraz Island *Al Capone Category:Buildings and structures in Los Angeles Category:1954 disestablishments Category:1950s disestablishments in the United States Category:20th-century disestablishments in California
title: Lincoln Heights Jail
